English.Text: Hugo believes that humans are virtuous by nature when they are not forced to compete under the rules of capitalism. Dr. Harvey Sprucer, one of the heads of Social Darwinism in the Old World, begs to differ, and has asked to be taken to Mercier's island to judge with eyes unclouded. Unafraid of confronting challenging ideas, Hugo has accepted and would like you to provide transport for the gentleman.
